snippet.title: GUNTOUCHABLES! Hardcore Co-op Action Roguelike
snippet.description:
GUNTOUCHABLES is a hardcore co-op action roguelike shooter for 1-4 players. You and your team of GUN RUNNERS must face hordes of merciless mutants in an escalating arms race to find and deliver crates of powerful upgrades. BUT your enemies will obtain any crates you leave behind during your missions, and use them to evolve into unpredictable and deadly new mutations that you will have to deal with in upcoming missions.

JOIN THE PLAYTEST AND WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2543510/GUNTOUCHABLES/

JOIN THE COMMUNITY AND FOLLOW DEVELOPMENT ON DISCORD: https://www.game-swing.com/discord
